name: Space Race Mod :)
description:
I made a little mod for the 1973 Atari arcade game, Space Race! 

This was a quick little one week assignment for class. Instead of reaching the other side to get a point you need to reach the other side to spawn asteroids that will destroy your opponent!

2 player game using WASD and Arrow Keys to move.

Press space to change the direction of all the asteroids!

:)
